block.p: Bryn Blair Williams, a daughter of Marlie R. McRoberts of Lexington, Ky., and Stephen G. Williams of Berwyn, Pa., was married yesterday to Drew Dickinson Fox, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Reeder R. Fox of Ardmore, Pa. The Rev. Georgia A. Snell, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Nantucket, Mass.

Mrs. Fox, 27, is a director of advertising sales in New York for the Egreetings Network, which creates and sells Internet greetings. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin at Madison. Her father is a family psychotherapist in Berwyn.

Bryn Blair Williams, a daughter of Marlie R. McRoberts of Lexington, Ky., and Stephen G. Williams of Berwyn, Pa., was married yesterday to Drew Dickinson Fox, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Reeder R. Fox of Ardmore, Pa. The Rev. Georgia A. Snell, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Nantucket, Mass.

Mrs. Fox, 27, is a director of advertising sales in New York for the Egreetings Network, which creates and sells Internet greetings. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin at Madison. Her father is a family psychotherapist in Berwyn.

Mr. Fox, 30, is a vice president and trader at Salomon Smith Barney, the New York securities brokerage firm. He graduated from the University of Virginia. His mother, Marion L. Fox, is a freelance writer in Philadelphia. His father is a partner in Duane, Morris & Heckscher, a Philadelphia law firm.
